dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, dating apps, right? Are they just, like, a total security risk now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, dating apps, right? Are they just, like, a total security risk now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! I just saw this piece, uh, from Almaty police, saying—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! I just saw this piece, uh, from Almaty police, saying-

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Polisia.kz! Criminals are literally using them as tools!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! the website! Criminals are literally using them as tools!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dating platforms have become a tool for criminals, police warned after a series of similar crimes, according to Polisia.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Tools! For, like, organized groups to target people, you know? It's not just a one-off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tools! For, like, organized groups to target people, you know? It's not just a one-off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Almaty police stated that organized groups are using these platforms to target victims.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! They're actively hunting on these platforms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! They're actively hunting on these platforms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the police are like, "Stay vigilant!" Which, okay, sounds obvious, but—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the police are like, Stay vigilant! Which, okay, sounds obvious, but-
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Police urged the public to stay vigilant when meeting people online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But when you're caught up in it, you're not always vigilant! They said, "Don't meet strangers alone in unfamiliar places."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But when you're caught up in it, you're not always vigilant! They said, Don't meet strangers alone in unfamiliar places.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Avoid meeting strangers alone in unfamiliar places, especially if invited to a private residence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Especially if it's a private residence! That's, um, like, the biggest red flag ever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially if it's a private residence! That's, um, like, the biggest red flag ever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Avoid meeting strangers alone in unfamiliar places, especially if invited to a private residence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A total red flag! And, uh, report it immediately, they said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A total red flag! And, uh, report it immediately, they said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If you become a victim of a crime, report it to the police immediately," the statement read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, if you become a victim— don't hesitate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, if you become a victim- don't hesitate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, like, what even is safe anymore, online?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, like, what even is safe anymore, online?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. This is beyond, you know, just, uh, bad dates. This is actual crime.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. This is beyond, you know, just, uh, bad dates. This is actual crime.

dialogue_turns.text: Actual crime! Using apps we all, like, casually scroll through.
